attributes.action: Ban visible tattoos on workers who deal with the public
attributes.additional_details:
For workers who deal with the public in any way visually to cover up any tattoos they may have, so the tattoo can not be seen, to prevent any offense the tattoos may cause.
If they can not be covered or the wearer does not wish to cover the tattoo whilst at work, then they should not be used in a front line position that deals with the public.
